GR14satvtanu:208: bālākṛtir viśadabālakabhāṣāhāsair gogopagopavanitāmudam āśu kartā // SatvT_2.49

GR14satvtanu:211: dhātrā yadā sapaśugopaśiśau praṇīte buddher bhramo halabhṛto 'bhavad aprameyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:212: tat saṃharan sapaśupālakulasvarūpaṃ kṛtvā vidhiṃ vividhamohamalāt sa dhartā // SatvT_2.51
GR14satvtanu:215: kaṃsasya raṅgasadanaṃ sabale praṇīte svāphalkinā bhavadhanus tarasā vibhajya /
GR14satvtanu:216: cāṇūraśūraśamanaṃ sahakaṃsamājau kartā dvipaṃ kuvalayaṃ sahasā nihatya // SatvT_2.53
GR14satvtanu:217: sāṃdīpanaṃ mṛtasutaṃ gurudakṣiṇārthī dattvā jarāsutabalaṃ yavanaṃ ca hatvā /
GR14satvtanu:218: śrīrukmiṇīprabhṛtidāraśataṃ vivāhya tābhyaḥ sutān daśadaśānu janiṣyati sma // SatvT_2.54
GR14satvtanu:219: bhaumaṃ nihatya sagaṇaṃ divi devamātur dātuṃ tadīyamaṇikuṇḍalam ādidevaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:220: gatvā surendratarurājavaraṃ priyāyāḥ prītau samuddharaṇato ditijān sa jetā // SatvT_2.55
GR14satvtanu:221: bāṇāsurasya samare mama vīryanāśāl labdhāmaratvam adhikaṃ yudhi bhūpabandhūn /
GR14satvtanu:222: jitvā yudhiṣṭhiranṛpakratunā vivāhabījaṃ nipātya gurubhārataraṃ prahartā // SatvT_2.56
GR14satvtanu:223: loke pradarśya sutarāṃ dvijadevapūjāṃ svasyāpy apārakaruṇāṃ nijasevakebhyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:224: trātvā parīkṣitanṛpaṃ paramāstradagdhaṃ pārthāya bhūtim avalokayitā dvijārthe // SatvT_2.57
GR14satvtanu:225: kāmena snehabhayarāgakuṭubasaṃdhe yasmin mano nivasataḥ śamalaṃ nirasya /
GR14satvtanu:226: dātā svarūpam amalaṃ pariśuddhabhāvaḥ sākṣāt svarūpaniratasya ca kiṃ nu vakṣye // SatvT_2.58
GR14satvtanu:227: yat pādapaṅkajaparāgaparāyaṇānām agre cakāsti na ca muktisukhaṃ nitāntam /
GR14satvtanu:228: kiṃ vānyadarpitabhayaṃ khalu kālavegaiḥ sākṣān mahāsukhasamudragatāntarāṇām // SatvT_2.59
GR14satvtanu:229: gaṅgāditīrthatapahomavratādikebhyaḥ kīrtiṃ svakīyam adhikāṃ samudīrya loke /
GR14satvtanu:230: atyunnataṃ dvijakulaṃ dvijaśāpavyājād dhatvā svalokam amalaṃ tanunābhigantā // SatvT_2.60
GR14satvtanu:231: tasmād bhaviṣyati sutaḥ sukhado janānāṃ pradyumnasaṃjña urugāyaguṇānurūpaḥ // SatvT_2.61
GR14satvtanu:232: kartā mudaṃ muditavaktrasucārugātraiḥ pātrair ivāmṛtapayo manujān pracchan /
GR14satvtanu:234: yasmād uṣāharaṇato bhujavīryanāśād bāṇo bhaviṣyati śivānugaśāntadehaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:235: vyāsād bhaviṣyati [... au2 ṇeichenjh] bhagavān araṇyāṃ yogī janān prati gadiṣyati vedasāram // SatvT_2.63
GR14satvtanu:236: śrīmatsuśāntam amalaṃ bhagavatpraṇītaṃ yac chraddhayā kalijanā api yānti śāntim /
GR14satvtanu:237: buddhāvatāram adhigamya kalāvalakṣair veṣair mater ativimohakaraṃ pralobham // SatvT_2.64
GR14satvtanu:238: pākhaṇḍaśāstram adhikalpya suradviṣāṇāṃ kartā jinasya tanayo bhagavān gayāyām /
GR14satvtanu:239: pākhaṇḍaśāstrabahule nijavedamārge naṣṭe dvijātibhir asatpathi vartamāne // SatvT_2.65
GR14satvtanu:241: sākṣād bhaviṣyati sarasvatisaṃjñitāyāṃ śrīsārvabhauma iti vedagupo dvijāgryāt // SatvT_2.66
GR14satvtanu:242: kṛtvā puraṃdaraśriyaṃ balaye 'tidāsyan goptāṣṭame manuyuge viditānubhāvaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:243: āyuḥ karo navamanoḥ samaye janānāṃ nītiṃ vidhātum amarārivināśanāya // SatvT_2.67
GR14satvtanu:244: goptā bhaviṣyati jagajjanadhārayāsau bhūtvā śrutendrasahito bhagavān apāraḥ /
GR14satvtanu:245: bhūtvā viśūcisadane dvijarājaśambhoḥ sāhityakarmaparavān daśame 'ntare saḥ // SatvT_2.68
GR14satvtanu:246: pātāmarān [... au3 ṇeichenjh] viśvak [... au1 ṇeichenjh] senasaṃjño yat sainyapūgasamarād amarārināśaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:247: manvantaraikadaśame 'rthakariprapautraḥ śrīdharmasetur iti viśruta ādidevaḥ // SatvT_2.69
GR14satvtanu:248: hatvāsurān surapatau vidhṛter apatye dātā tṛtīyabhavanaṃ bhagavān svayambhūḥ /
GR14satvtanu:249: jāto dviṣaṇmanuyuge yugapālanāya viprāt svaśaktimahasaḥ sunṛtākhyato vai // SatvT_2.70
GR14satvtanu:250: khyāto bhaviṣyati tato bhagavān svadhāmā yasmāj janā jagati saukhyam apāram āpuḥ /
GR14satvtanu:251: bhāvye trayodaśayuge bhavitādidevaḥ śrīdevahotratanayo bhagavān bṛhatyām // SatvT_2.71
GR14satvtanu:252: yogeśvaro divi divaspatiśakramitro yogād ameyavapuṣā sa vitānatulyaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:253: satrāyaṇasya sadane bhagavān anādidevo 'pi devavanitātanayo 'bhijātaḥ // SatvT_2.72
GR14satvtanu:255: ete mayā bhagavataḥ kathitā dvijāte śuddhāvatāranicayā jagato hitārthāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:258: tam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmi kṛṣṇaṃ brahmāṇḍanāyakam // SatvT_2.74
GR14satvtanu:265: katham aṃśakalābhāga etad varṇaya no vibho // SatvT_3.2
GR14satvtanu:267: satyam uktaṃ tvayā brahman kṛṣṇasya jagadātmanaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:268: avatāreṣu sarveṣu bhedād aṃśakalāḥ svataḥ // SatvT_3.3
GR14satvtanu:270: avikārād acyutāc ca nirbhedād brahmarūpiṇaḥ // SatvT_3.4
GR14satvtanu:274: tathāpi kāryataḥ kecid dṛśyante na hi sarvataḥ // SatvT_3.6
GR14satvtanu:275: aiśvaryajñānadharmāś ca vairāgyaṃ śrīr yaśas tathā /
GR14satvtanu:276: eṣāṃ saṃdarśanāt sākṣāt pūrṇo vidvadbhir ucyate // SatvT_3.7
GR14satvtanu:279: aṃśas turīyo bhāgaḥ syāt kalā tu ṣoḍaśī matā /
GR14satvtanu:280: śatabhāgo vibhūtiś ca varṇyate kavibhiḥ pṛthak // SatvT_3.9
GR14satvtanu:282: yaśasaḥ pṛthagbhedaṃ mattaḥ śṛṇu dvijottama // SatvT_3.10
GR14satvtanu:284: eṣāṃ jñānaṃ vadanty aṅga jñānaṃ ṣaḍvidham uttamam // SatvT_3.11
GR14satvtanu:285: satyaṃ śaucaṃ dayā maunaṃ dharmaś cāturvidhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:286: amāno vyatirekaś ca aindriyas tu vaśīkṛtaḥ // SatvT_3.12
GR14satvtanu:288: aṇimā laghimā caiva mahimā tadanantaram // SatvT_3.13
GR14satvtanu:289: prākāmyaṃ caiva prāptiś ca īśitā vaśitā tathā /
GR14satvtanu:290: kāmasyāvasitā hy ete aṣṭaiśvaryāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // SatvT_3.14
GR14satvtanu:293: gṛhā bhūr astraśastre ca durgādyāḥ śriya īritāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:294: yaśas tu puṃso bhavati karmato guṇatas tathā // SatvT_3.16
GR14satvtanu:298: tathāpy ahaṃ dviṣaṣṭhīṃ te varṇayāmy anupūrvaśaḥ // SatvT_3.18
GR14satvtanu:299: brahmaṇyaś ca śaraṇyaś ca bhaktavātsalyam eva ca /
GR14satvtanu:303: śauryam audāryam āstikyaṃ sthairyaṃ dhairyaṃ prasannatā /
GR14satvtanu:304: gāmbhīryaṃ praśrayaḥ śīlaṃ prāgalbhyam ṛtamaṅgalam // SatvT_3.21
GR14satvtanu:305: śamo damo balaṃ dākṣyaṃ kṣemaṃ harṣo 'nahaṃkṛtiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:306: saṃtoṣa ārjavaṃ sāmyaṃ manobhāgyaṃ śrutaṃ sukham // SatvT_3.22
GR14satvtanu:307: tyāgo bhayaṃ pāvanaṃ ca tejaḥ kauśalam āśrayaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:308: dhṛtiḥ kṣamā smṛtir lajjā śraddhā maitrī dayonnatiḥ // SatvT_3.23
GR14satvtanu:309: śāntiḥ puṣṭiḥ svavākśuddhir buddhir vidyā svarakṣatā /
GR14satvtanu:310: ete te bhagabhedās tu kathitā hy anupūrvaśaḥ // SatvT_3.24
GR14satvtanu:311: eṣāṃ prakāśo yatrāsīt sa pūrṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:312: aṃśaprakāśād aṃśaḥ syāt kalāyās tu kalā smṛtā // SatvT_3.25
GR14satvtanu:313: vibhūtes tu vibhūtiḥ syād eṣa bhedo na hi svataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:316: yataḥ kṛṣṇāvatāreṇa bhagabhedāḥ pṛthak pṛthak // SatvT_3.27
GR14satvtanu:319: darśitā bhagabhedā vai tasmād aṃśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:322: tathā śuklādayo hy āvirbhāvā ṛṣabha ātmavān // SatvT_3.30
GR14satvtanu:327: gayaḥ pṛthuś ca bharataḥ śaktiyuktāḥ kalā matāḥ /
GR14satvtanu:328: guṇāvatārā brahmādyās tadaṃśā ye vibhūtayaḥ // SatvT_3.33
GR14satvtanu:331: na brahmaṇo bhidā vipra śrīkṛṣṇasya ca sattama /
GR14satvtanu:332: nārāyaṇasya vā saumya hy avatārisvarūpiṇaḥ // SatvT_3.35
GR14satvtanu:335: kiṃ brahma paramaṃ sākṣāt kiṃ vā nārāyaṇo vibhuḥ // SatvT_3.36
GR14satvtanu:337: kim ekatattvam eteṣām athavā kiṃ pṛthak pṛthak // SatvT_3.37
GR14satvtanu:339: śṛṇu tat paramaṃ guhyaṃ brahmadāyāda sattama /
GR14satvtanu:340: avatārisvarūpaṃ me yathā varṇayato dvija // SatvT_3.39
GR14satvtanu:341: ekam eva paraṃ tattvam avatāri sanātanam /
GR14satvtanu:344: tathā śrīkṛṣṇadevasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca // SatvT_3.41
GR14satvtanu:346: śrīkṛṣṇākhyaṃ paraṃ dhāma paramānandam uttamam // SatvT_3.42
GR14satvtanu:350: vadanti brahma paramaṃ prakāśātmakam avyayam // SatvT_3.44
GR14satvtanu:356: anantaśaktiṃ sarveṣāṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛteḥ param // SatvT_3.47
GR14satvtanu:359: ataḥ kṛṣṇasya devasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣasya ca /
GR14satvtanu:360: vastuto naiva bhedo hi varṇyate tair api dvija // SatvT_3.49
GR14satvtanu:362: tathā sa bhagavān kṛṣṇo nāneva paricakṣate // SatvT_3.50
GR14satvtanu:368: muktyādyarthaṃ nṛlokasya mānuṣatvaṃ yato gataḥ // SatvT_3.53
GR14satvtanu:369: atas taṃ puruṣā nityaṃ bhaktibhedena nityadā /
GR14satvtanu:370: bhajanti hy apavargeśaṃ pareśaṃ tadakāmyayā // SatvT_3.54
GR14satvtanu:371: mayā te kathitā vipra avatārā mahātmanaḥ /
GR14satvtanu:372: kim anyat kathayāmy adya tvaṃ hi bhāgavatottamaḥ // SatvT_3.55
GR14satvtanu:376: nāsti tṛptiḥ śṛṇvato me tava vāgamṛtaṃ hareḥ /
GR14satvtanu:378: tathāpi sāmprataṃ hy etac chrutvā kautūhalaṃ mama /
GR14satvtanu:379: bhaktibhedaṃ bhagavato bhāvanīyaṃ sadā nṛbhiḥ // SatvT_4.2
GR14satvtanu:380: brūhi me bhagavan viṣṇor bhaktibhedaṃ sadāśiva /
GR14satvtanu:381: yaj jñātvā hy añjasā viṣṇoḥ sāmyaṃ yāti janaḥ prabho // SatvT_4.3
GR14satvtanu:383: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā sādho paraṃ guhyatamaṃ yataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:384: anyasmai na mayā proktaṃ vinā bhāgavatān narāt // SatvT_4.4
GR14satvtanu:385: yadaivāvocaṃ māṃ kṛṣṇo dhyānāt tuṣṭamanā vibhuḥ /
GR14satvtanu:387: tadā cāhaṃ tasya pādapaṅkaje śirasā nataḥ /
GR14satvtanu:388: babhāṣa etad bhagavān bhaktān nirdeṣṭum arhasi // SatvT_4.6
GR14satvtanu:389: tadā prītamanā devo mām uvāca satāṃ gatiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:390: śṛṇuṣva śiva bhadraṃ te bhaktān vakṣyāmi sātvatān // SatvT_4.7
GR14satvtanu:392: bhaktān jānīhi me deva sarvalokapraṇāmakān // SatvT_4.8
GR14satvtanu:394: bravīmi śiva te bhaktis tenaiva samprasidhyati // SatvT_4.9
GR14satvtanu:395: yadi tvadvākyaniṣṭhaḥ syād yo 'pi ko 'pi sadāśiva /
GR14satvtanu:396: tasmai prītamanā vācyo bhaktibhedaḥ sasādhanaḥ // SatvT_4.10
GR14satvtanu:397: tad idaṃ te pravakṣyāmi bhaktibhedaṃ sasādhanam /
GR14satvtanu:399: ekaiva bhaktiḥ śrīviṣṇoḥ prītir ity ucyate budhaiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:401: kiṃ tu jñānakriyālīlābhedaiḥ sā trividhā matā /
GR14satvtanu:402: tān śṛṇuṣvānupūrvyeṇa mattaḥ svavahito dvija // SatvT_4.13
GR14satvtanu:404: sā nirguṇajñānamayī sākṣād api garīyasī // SatvT_4.14
GR14satvtanu:408: satsaṅgajānyāsād grāhyā sarvadā sā hy anuttamā // SatvT_4.16
GR14satvtanu:410: yām āśritya samāpnoti jano bhaktiṃ janārdane // SatvT_4.17
GR14satvtanu:416: sameṣu mitrabhāvena dīneṣu dayayā tathā // SatvT_4.20
GR14satvtanu:418: bhūteṣu bhagavaddṛṣṭyā nirguṇā bhaktir ucyate // SatvT_4.21
GR14satvtanu:419: labdhvā tāṃ nirguṇāṃ bhaktiṃ muktiṃ cāpi na manyate /
GR14satvtanu:422: yat sarvayatnataḥ kāryaṃ puruṣeṇa manīṣiṇā // SatvT_4.23
GR14satvtanu:425: vācoccāro harer nāmnāṃ karṇābhyāṃ karmaṇāṃ śrutiḥ /
GR14satvtanu:430: dṛṣṭvā viṣṇujanādīnām īkṣaṇaṃ sādareṇa ca // SatvT_4.27
GR14satvtanu:432: bāhupādādibhir viṣṇor vandanaṃ parayā mudā // SatvT_4.28
GR14satvtanu:435: āśu sampadyate bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe bhāgavatī satī /
GR14satvtanu:437: svābhāvikī ratir abhūt sā vai bhāgavatī matā /
GR14satvtanu:438: etadbhaktiparo vipra cāturvargyaṃ na manyate // SatvT_4.31
GR14satvtanu:439: tasyām antaḥ sarvasukham adhikaṃ vāpi labhyate /
GR14satvtanu:442: sadguror upadeśena labdhvā satsaṅgam ādṛtaḥ // SatvT_4.33
GR14satvtanu:444: teṣv evaṃ kīrtanaṃ teṣāṃ manasā cāpi cintanam // SatvT_4.34
GR14satvtanu:446: yady aśakto bhavet kīrtau smaraṇe cāpi sarvaśaḥ // SatvT_4.35
GR14satvtanu:447: tadā tu bhagavannāmnām āvṛttau vṛttayet sadā /
GR14satvtanu:448: sadā śaśvat prītiyukto yaḥ kuryād etad anvaham // SatvT_4.36
GR14satvtanu:449: tasyāśu bhaktiḥ śrīkṛṣṇe jāyate sadbhir ādṛtā /
GR14satvtanu:450: evaṃ premamayīṃ labdhvā bhittvā saṃsāram ātmanaḥ // SatvT_4.37
GR14satvtanu:453: nānusaṃdhatta etā vai vinā bhaktiṃ janārdane /
GR14satvtanu:454: yady anyasādhanāny anyabhaktau kuryād atantritaḥ // SatvT_4.39
GR14satvtanu:455: na tatra kaścid doṣaḥ syād dharisevā yataḥ kṛtā /
GR14satvtanu:456: kiṃ tu yad bhaktiniṣṭhā syāt tām evāpnoti mānavaḥ // SatvT_4.40
GR14satvtanu:457: phalabhedena bhedaḥ syāt sādhanena na bhidyate /
GR14satvtanu:458: pṛthag eṣa mayākhyāto bhaktibhedaḥ sasādhanaḥ // SatvT_4.41
GR14satvtanu:460: sakāmaḥ saguṇo vipra bahudhokto maharṣibhiḥ // SatvT_4.42
GR14satvtanu:461: kiṃ bhūyaḥ kathayāmy adya vada māṃ dvijasattama /
GR14satvtanu:463: vidheyaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā me surasattama /
GR14satvtanu:464: niṣedhanīyaṃ kiṃ cātra bhaktistambhakaraṃ ca yat // SatvT_4.43
GR14satvtanu:469: niṣedhanīyaṃ tat tāsāṃ bhaktānāṃ puruṣottame // SatvT_4.45
GR14satvtanu:473: bhaktighnadoṣaṃ śṛṇu taṃ sarvathā varjanaṃ nṛṇām // SatvT_4.47
GR14satvtanu:475: premamayyāṃ satāṃ dveṣo bhaktināśakarā ime // SatvT_4.48
GR14satvtanu:477: dveṣeṇa narakaṃ yāti kurvan bhaktim api dvijaḥ // SatvT_4.49
GR14satvtanu:478: doṣadṛṣṭyā doṣavān syāt tatra doṣaphalaṃ bhavet /
GR14satvtanu:479: martyadṛṣṭyā kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ bhavet kuñjaraśaucavat // SatvT_4.50
GR14satvtanu:481: yayā bhaktir bhagavati hy añjasā syāt sukhāvahā // SatvT_4.51
GR14satvtanu:483: kāryā saiva tu tat sarvā bhagavadbhaktivardhinī // SatvT_4.52
GR14satvtanu:486: premamayyāṃ satāṃ prītyā śravaṇaṃ yaśasāṃ hareḥ /
GR14satvtanu:487: mukhyāḥ sādhanasampattyaḥ kathitās te dvijottama // SatvT_4.54
GR14satvtanu:489: yad vinā sravate bhaktir āmabhāṇḍāt payo yathā // SatvT_4.55
GR14satvtanu:492: vinā yena pumān yāti kurvan bhaktim api śramam // SatvT_4.56
GR14satvtanu:495: pariniṣṭhāśrayaṃ yad vai śaraṇaṃ parikīrtitam // SatvT_4.57
GR14satvtanu:496: etad vai trividhaṃ proktaṃ vedavidbhir dvijottama /
GR14satvtanu:497: prathamaṃ madhyamaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kramaśaḥ śṛṇu tan mune // SatvT_4.58
GR14satvtanu:499: yad buddhiniṣṭhitaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛtaṃ tat prathamaṃ smṛtam // SatvT_4.59
GR14satvtanu:501: yan mamatvāśrayaṃ kṛṣṇe kṛtaṃ tan madhyamaṃ smṛtam // SatvT_4.60
GR14satvtanu:503: tat sarvaṃ kṛṣṇapādābje kṛtaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ prakīrtitam // SatvT_4.61
GR14satvtanu:504: īśvaraṃ tadadhīnaṃ ca taddharmaṃ ca sanātanam /
GR14satvtanu:505: hitvānyad āśrayaṃ tasya vastuto naiva dṛśyate // SatvT_4.62
